title: How to Do the Birthday Card Trick

steps.headline: Make sure the top six cards are as follows, from top to bottom: 5 of diamonds, 3 of diamonds, 6 of clubs, 10 of hearts, 8 of clubs, Queen of hearts.
Have your audience (one or two people) take the top six cards off the way they are and pick any one of them.
Have them spell the card in their mind.
steps.description: For every letter they say, have them move the top card to the bottom. For example the 3 of clubs would be: T-H-R-E-E-C-L-U-B-S

steps.headline: Put the pile of six cards back and "shuffle" them into the deck, making sure the top card in the pile of six stays on top
Put your cards in your back pocket, ask the date of birth, and start pulling cards from the BOTTOM.
For the last card, pull out the TOP card and place it face-down on top of the rest.
steps.description: Ask what card your audience picked, then flip the card over.

steps.headline: It should be the card your audience picked!

text: Make sure the top six cards are as follows, from top to bottom: 5 of diamonds, 3 of diamonds, 6 of clubs, 10 of hearts, 8 of clubs, Queen of hearts.  Have your audience (one or two people) take the top six cards off the way they are and pick any one of them.  Have them spell the card in their mind. For every letter they say, have them move the top card to the bottom. For example the 3 of clubs would be: T-H-R-E-E-C-L-U-B-S Put the pile of six cards back and "shuffle" them into the deck, making sure the top card in the pile of six stays on top  Put your cards in your back pocket, ask the date of birth, and start pulling cards from the BOTTOM.  For the last card, pull out the TOP card and place it face-down on top of the rest. Ask what card your audience picked, then flip the card over. It should be the card your audience picked!
sentences: Make sure the top six cards are as follows, from top to bottom: 5 of diamonds, 3 of diamonds, 6 of clubs, 10 of hearts, 8 of clubs, Queen of hearts.
Have your audience (one or two people) take the top six cards off the way they are and pick any one of them.
Have them spell the card in their mind.
For every letter they say, have them move the top card to the bottom.

For example the 3 of clubs would be: T-H-R-E-E-C-L-U-B-S Put the pile of six cards back and "shuffle" them into the deck, making sure the top card in the pile of six stays on top  Put your cards in your back pocket, ask the date of birth, and start pulling cards from the BOTTOM.
For the last card, pull out the TOP card and place it face-down on top of the rest.
Ask what card your audience picked, then flip the card over.
It should be the card your audience picked!
tyn_section: A deck of cards with the cards needed (said in instructions)
Someone whom you wouldn't know the birth date of (works best as street magic)
